Title: Establishes the crime of harassment of an employee by an incarcerated individual
Summary: Establishes the crime of harassment of an employee by an incarcerated individual; makes such crime a class B misdemeanor.
LawCode: Add ยง240.34, Pen L; amd ยง851, Cor L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law and the correction law, in relation to establishing the crime of harassment of an employee by an incarcerated individual
